refnamediv.refpurpose: Imports and returns the python module passed.

listitem.para: The module to be imported like numpy, builtins etc.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Description
refsynopsisdiv.para: Imports a python module and is assigned to a variable, which can be later used by the variable.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Example
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis:
--> Py = pyImport("builtins") Py =
<module 'builtins' (built-in)> --> var = Py.complex(1,2) var =
(1+2j)
